tool_description: This anime news API allows users to get details about the latest anime news, including the news headline, category, publication date and a brief introduction. It also provides an image relevant to the news item and the full content of the news item. Users can use this API to stay updated on the latest anime news easily and quickly
name: Anime News Net
title: Anime News Net

api_list.name: Get details of a news item
api_list.description: Get the details of each news item, such as the title, an image and the body of the news item, in addition to other properties
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-news-net.p.rapidapi.com/api/news/details/2023-03-17/mai-nishikata-game-between-the-suits-manga-resumes-after-2-years/.196030"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-news-net.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-news-net.p.rapidapi.com/api/news/details/{date}/{title}/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-news-net.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get anime news list
api_list.description: Get the most up-to-date anime list up to date and in real time
api_list.code:
